gate.creole.measurements

Class MeasurementsTagger

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.util.AbstractFeatureBearer
      • gate.creole.AbstractResource
        • gate.creole.AbstractProcessingResource
          • gate.creole.AbstractLanguageAnalyser
            • gate.creole.measurements.MeasurementsTagger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.creole.ANNIEConstants, gate.event.ProgressListener, gate.Executable, gate.LanguageAnalyser, gate.ProcessingResource, gate.Resource, gate.util.FeatureBearer, gate.util.NameBearer, Serializable, EventListener

    @CreoleResource(name="Measurement Tagger",
                comment="A measurement tagger based upon GNU Units",
                icon="measurements.png")
public class MeasurementsTagger
extends gate.creole.AbstractLanguageAnalyser
implements gate.event.ProgressListener
    A GATE PR which annotates and normalizes measurements. Each measurement is also normalized back to SI units which allows measurements specified using different units to be compared. For example 30cm and 300mm are both normalized to 0.3m. The parsing of measurements is based upon a modified version of the Java port of the GNU Units package.
    Author:
    Mark A. Greenwood
    See Also:
    The GATE User Guide, Serialized Form
